{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.200px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ADI_Engineering_Pronghorn_SBC250 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = activation |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ADI Engineering |model = Pronghorn SBC-250 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = RTR |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/28/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ADI_Engineering_Pronghorn_SBC250 |wlclass = AG108 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = CPE, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP425;PRIXP425ABD; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 533 <!-- 266 / 400 / 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F128J3D75; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Micron;MT48LC16M16A2-75D; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM5241; |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10/100 --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:02:6F |oui = 00:08:A2
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Redboot;3.40;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.26.3;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, Compact Flash, |exp_minipci_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 5 |pwr_poe_amp = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port (RJ45),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, J5
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 1 to 4 Clock Buffer;Integrated Device Technology;ICS551;;1;,,, Quad Differential Comparator;Texas Instruments;LM339A;;1;,,, Current Mode PWM Controller;Maxim Integrated Products;MAX5014;;1; ,,, 2A PWM Step-Down Regulator;Maxim Integrated Products;MAX1951;;1;,,, 5V, Voltage Monitoring Microprocessor Supervisor;Analog Devices;ADM708;;1;,,, 3V to 6V, 6A Synchronous Buck PWM Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS54610;;1;,,, 3V to 5.5V Multichannel RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;SN65C3232;;1;,,, Hex Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC07A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = OpenWrt |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, LEDE Project, OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2007 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = EnGenius NMP-8602 PLUS |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR5414; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
